air:FareRule.air:FareRuleLong: APPLICATION AND OTHER CONDITIONS RULE - 304/2200 UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED TK DOMESTIC FARES APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY WITHIN TURKEY. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS.
FLIGHT APPLICATION UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY TK FLIGHT.
TRANSFERS UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED NO TRANSFERS PERMITTED FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT. NOTE - SURFACE SECTORS WITHIN A FARE COMPONENT ARE NOT PERMITTED.

PERMITTED COMBINATIONS UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED ADD-ONS NOT PERMITTED. FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS WITH ANY FARE FOR ANY CARRIER IN ANY RULE AND TARIFF TO FORM SINGLE/DOUBLE OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS. END-ON-END END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED WITH DOMESTIC/ INTERNATIONAL FARES. VALIDATE ALL FARE COMPONENTS. FARES MUST BE SHOWN SEPARATELY ON THE TICKET. TRAVEL MUST BE VIA THE POINT OF COMBINATION.
SALES RESTRICTIONS UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED TICKETS MAY BE ISSUED BY PTA. TICKETS MAY NOT BE SOLD IN IRAN,ISLAMIC REPUBLIC OF. NOTE - UPGRADE TO ANY HGHER FARE IS PERMTTED

PENALTIES UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED CHANGES CHANGES PERMITTED FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION. CANCELLATIONS BEFORE DEPARTURE CANCELLATIONS PERMITTED. NOTE - AFTER DEPARTURE REFUND THE FARE PAID LESS -OW FARE
HIP/MILEAGE EXCEPTIONS UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED NOTE - IGNORE ANY HIGHER INTERMEDIATE FARE.
TICKET ENDORSEMENT UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED - NONEND/TK ONLY - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.

CHILDREN DISCOUNTS UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH OR - 1ST INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
TOUR CONDUCTOR DISCOUNTS NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
AGENT DISCOUNTS NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
VOLUNTARY CHANGES DO A CATEGORY 31 SPECIFIC TEXT ENTRY TO VIEW CONTENTS ALSO REFERENCE 16 PENALTIES - FOR ADDITIONAL CHANGE INFORMATION
